dialogue.doctor: Where is this lesion located on your body?
dialogue.patient: This lesion is located on my face, specifically on my cheek.

dialogue.doctor: Is there more than one of these spots?
dialogue.patient: Yes, there are multiple spots on my skin that look like this.

dialogue.doctor: How big do you estimate this spot to be?
dialogue.patient: I estimate this spot to be about the size of a pencil tip.

dialogue.doctor: What color do you think this spot is?
dialogue.patient: I think this spot is pinkish-red.

dialogue.doctor: Does the edge of this spot look smooth or rough?
Can you describe how this spot feels when you touch it?
dialogue.patient: When I touch this spot, it feels rough and uneven, like a small bump or a callus.

dialogue.doctor: Do you feel any discomfort in this area?
dialogue.patient: No, I don't feel any discomfort in this area.

dialogue.doctor: How often does this spot appear?
dialogue.patient: I've noticed this spot a few times over the past few months. It seems to come and go.
